name: Drop and Merge Blocks
description:
Drop and merge is a simple drop block and merge number game. 

blocks with numbers 1/2/3/4... born from top , and you should drag to drop them and merge the same number blocks.

Special blocks like C for coin block, and B for Bomb block, and v for drop only block should give you much more happy!

Also play on facebook instant games:

https://fb.gg/play/836744803387985
